title: Two Journeys Inward

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Ayahuasca and hypnosis. One like being thrown through the stained-glass window of your psyche, the other like tiptoeing through your own personal backstage.
dialogue.context: The AI contrasts two different methods of consciousness exploration

scene_context: A 2-panel scene showing a window with dual reflections - a brain and a passage - as the Architect poetically compares ayahuasca's explosive revelation to hypnosis's gentle exploration.
philosophical_theme: Different paths to self-knowledge and their distinct phenomenologies
visual_elements: Window with two reflections: brain (rational) and passage (journey)
